original_text: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin, and have omitted the weightier matters of the law, judgment, mercy, and faith: these ought ye to have done, and not to leave the other undone.
korean_text: 화 있을진저 외식하는 서기관들과 바리새인들이여 너희가 박하와 회향과 근채의 십일조는 드리되 율법의 더 중한 바 정의와 긍휼과 믿음은 버렸도다 그러나 이것도 행하고 저것도 버리지 말아야 할지니라

sentences.original_text: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites!
for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 박하와 회향과 귤의 십일조를 바치면서

sentences.original_text: and have omitted the weightier matters of the law
these ought ye to have done
and not to leave the other undone
